content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 10, "index": 13}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 17}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_fence_gate", "quantity": 38, "index": 25}, {"type": "flower_pot", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 8, "index": 29}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 64, "index": 32}, {"type": "leather_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "heart_of_the_sea", "quantity": 44, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a wooden_sword, I need to craft crimson_planks first. I have a stripped_crimson_stem in slot 14, so I will move it to slot 1 to craft the crimson_planks.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: I have crafted the crimson_planks, so I will move it to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

thought: Now I need to craft the wooden_sword. To do this, I need to place 1 crimson_plank and 1 stick in the crafting grid. I have a crimson_plank in slot 11, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
